results.text: And the peace of God, which transcends all understanding, will guard your hearts and your minds in Christ Jesus.
results.reason: This verse speaks directly to the divine peace that protects and comforts believers, surpassing human comprehension.
results.reflection: Trust in God's peace to safeguard your mind amidst life's chaos.

results.text: Peace I leave with you; my peace I give to you. Not as the world gives do I give to you. Let not your hearts be troubled, neither let them be afraid.
results.reason: Jesus promises His unique peace to His followers, offering reassurance and comfort beyond worldly peace.
results.reflection: Embrace the peace Jesus offers; it calms fears and steadies the heart.

results.text: The LORD gives strength to his people; the LORD blesses his people with peace.
results.reason: This verse declares God's blessing of peace upon His people, emphasizing His role as a source of strength and tranquility.
results.reflection: Receive God's strength and peace as a sustaining blessing in your life.

results.text: Now may the Lord of peace himself give you peace at all times and in every way. The Lord be with all of you.
results.reason: The apostle Paul prays for continuous peace from the Lord, highlighting its constancy and availability.
results.reflection: Invite the Lord's peace into every moment and situation you face.

results.text: You keep him in perfect peace whose mind is stayed on you, because he trusts in you.
results.reason: This verse promises perfect peace for those who focus and trust in God, offering deep comfort and assurance.
results.reflection: Maintain your focus on God to experience His perfect peace in your life.
